description: Manage VMware virtual machine's Network Interface Cards.

commands.name: az csvmware vm nic add
commands.summary: Add NIC to a VMware virtual machine.
commands.syntax:
az csvmware vm nic add --resource-group
                       --virtual-network
                       --vm-name
                       [--adapter {E1000, E1000E, PCNET32, VMXNET, VMXNET2, VMXNET3}]
                       [--power-on-boot {false, true}]
examples: az csvmware vm nic add --vm-name MyVm -g MyResourceGroup --virtual-network MyVirtualNetwork
az csvmware vm nic add --vm-name MyVm -g MyResourceGroup --virtual-network MyVirtualNetwork --adapter E1000E --power-on-boot true

commands.name: az csvmware vm nic delete
examples: az csvmware vm nic delete --vm-name MyVm -g MyResourceGroup --nics "My NIC Name 1" "My NIC Name 2"

commands.name: az csvmware vm nic list
commands.summary: List details of NICs available on a VMware virtual machine.
examples: az csvmware vm nic list --vm-name MyVm -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az csvmware vm nic show
commands.summary: Get the details of a VMware virtual machine's NIC.
examples: az csvmware vm nic show --vm-name MyVm -g MyResourceGroup -n "My NIC Name"
